h2_title: Where to Find the Whiteclad Noble
content: As a required boss, you can't miss running into this character when exploring Black Wind Mountain. You'll find him guarding the end of the Marsh of White Mist in the Bamboo Grove, past where you save and befriend the Shen Monkey that can upgrade your Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Whiteclad_Noble.md', within the main section titled 'Whiteclad Noble', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Whiteclad Noble'.
The content is as follows:
As a required boss, you can't miss running into this character when exploring Black Wind Mountain. You'll find him guarding the end of the Marsh of White Mist in the Bamboo Grove, past where you save and befriend the Shen Monkey that can upgrade your Gourd.
